version_description: Shipping hold function added on each long-term contract

Finally, the ocean alliance begins in the multiplayer mode. (Not support in single player mode)
If you have an oil tanker license and 700 trust or more, you can create a new alliance with 50 credits.
Once you get a regular operation license, you can join an alliance.

The characteristics of the ocean alliance are as follows.
- Up to 7 companies per alliance can participate.
- All members can freely participate in the alliance long-term contracts, and obtain stable profits.
- Your contract that has not yet begun shipping can be transferred to another member.
- If you increase your alliance level by accumulating points through alliance activities, all members can receive a discount on ship purchasing and fuel charge.
- Alliance board is provided separately.
- You can set the main language for your alliance.

Please join the ocean alliance and enjoy playing with others.
Thank you.

The Slow channels will be open regularly from October 2nd.
Slow channels are for users who do not have enough leisure time.
Slow channels have a small cumulative playing time every two hours and will end in 2020, which is ten years less than normal channels.
The ending compensation is the same as normal channel.

Thank you.

Alliance UI improvements
Added ability to send alliance messages
Added ability to change alliance name
Shipment remaining in long-term contract details
Fix known bugs

iPhone X screen support
Bug fixes

A drill ship have been added.
- The drill ship is a ship of the concept of a subsidiary business which does not need manual operation unlike other ships.
- After installing the drill ship in the offshore oil area, it will provide stable income after several months of oil exploration.
- It is possible to install one drill ship in one place.

iPhone X & XS screen fit
Minor bug fix
